title: Corel Roxio Creator NXT Pro 3 16.0 Multilingual Incl Keymaker-[
description:
Corel Roxio Creator NXT Pro 3 16.0 Multilingual Incl Keymaker-[FirstUploads]


Roxio Creator NXT Pro 3 - Take photo & video projects to the next level. PaintShop Pro X6: Advanced photo editing and creative design. HDR Express 3: Easy, pro-quality high-dynamic range photos. Roxio Secure Burn: Easy disc burning and encryption. iZotope Music & Speech Cleaner: Noise removal and audio clean up 14 video effects to enhance video. WinDVD: Easy DVD and AVCHD playback on your PC. HD video authoring on Blu-ray Discs.

PRO gives you more
All the power of Creator NXT 3 + $300 in valuable extras

NEW! PaintShop Pro X6
Create your best photos ever with everything you need for photo-editing and creative design. With pro-quality tools, RAW editing, layers and striking effects, you can quickly transform any photo into a stunning image.

NEW! HDR ExpressÃ¢â€žÂ¢ 3
Create intense photos with impressive visual contrast with new HDR Express 3 from Unified Color. Enjoy stunning imagery with vibrant, true and beautiful colors.

HDR Preferences and Tips
Explore advanced preferences and settings in HDR Express. Set different output preferences, create, edit, import and export custom presets as well as general preferences and histogram functionality.

Rich video playback
Enjoy crystal clear playback and theater-like surround sound on your PC with WinDVD.

Amazing Video Effects
Spice up your videos with 14 amazing video effects found in nature and beyond: fire, fog, rainfall, snow storm, smoke, fireworks, fairy dust, aged film, skew, newsprint, and more.

Remove unwanted noise & enhance audio
iZotope Music and Speech Cleaner easily removes unwanted noise from LPs, cassettes, video recorded on your camcorder, cell phone or camera. Experience increased audio clarity and enhanced sound!

Secure Burn
Roxio Secure Burn reliably burns data on CD, DVD and Blu-ray Discs as easily as dragging and dropping files and folders on the desktop. Protect data with powerful encryption and passwords for secure sharing and access by authorized users.

Author high-def video on Blu-ray discs
High-Def/Blu-ray Disc Plug-in for Creator allows you to author high-definition video content on to Blu-ray discs!

Input Formats:
Video: AVI, DV, HDV, DV-AVI, MPEG-1/2/4, MPEG2-HD, DVD-Video, DVR-MS, ASF, MOV, WMV, QuickTime, 3GP, MPE2 Transport Stream, AVC(H.264), AVCHD, 3D over/under full and half-height, side-by-side full and half-width, 3D MPO
Audio: Audio CD, MP3, WAV, WMA, DolbyÃ‚Â® Digital AC-3, AAC, Ogg Vorbis, FLAC, M4a, MP4, Playlists (WPL, ASX, M3U, PLS, XSPF)
Image: 3D MPO, JPG, PNG, TIFF, BMP, GIF.

Output Formats:
Video: AVI, DV-AVI, HDV, MpPEG-1/2/4, MPEG-2 HD, WMV, WMV HD, AVC(H.264), AVCHD, 3GP, DivXÃ‚Â®, DivX PlusÃ‚Â®, 3D MPO, 3D side-by-side full and half-width, over/under full and half-height, anaglyph red/cyan
Audio: MP3, WAV, WMA, Dolby Digital AC-3, Ogg Vorbis, FLAC, MPEG-1/2, M4a, M4b AAC, Playlists (M3U, PLS, XSPF, WPL)
Image: JPG, PNG, TIFF, BMP, GIF, 3D MPO
Video disc formats: DVD, Video CD (VCD), Super Video CD (SVCD), Mini DVD. Creator NXT Pro 3 also supports BD.

Recordable Formats:
CD-R/RW, DVD+R/RW, DVD-R/RW, DVD-R DL, DVD+R DL, DVD-RAM, BD-R/RE, BD-R/RE DL
Disc image formats: read ISO, C2D, BIN/CUE and GI; write ISO and GI

Supported Languages:
Creator NXT 3: English, French, Italian, German , Spanish, Dutch, Brazilian Portuguese, Japanese
Live Screen Capture: English, French, Italian, German, Dutch, Japanese
Creator NXT Pro 3 Languages for Additional Applications:
iZotope Music & Speech Cleaner: English, Italian, German, Japanese
HDR Express 3 is English only, 64-bit only
